name: Ultimate Bullet
description:
Welcome to Ultimate Bullet!

This is a game where you need to dodge all of the moving Bullets and enjoy the music in the game!

Control go here:

mouse to slow motion

Z to make gud explosion 

X to make Square Explode thing 

C to make BIG Circles 

Space to make shield 

Hold A to make a Dark Area Around You 

V to make a WHOLE BLACK HOLE WHAT THE F-

And More Buttons (All you need to do is figure it out)
